info.abstract: The Output Comparator component can compare files of type XML, properties or tab-delimited.
info.description: This component allows you to compare files of XML, properties or tabular format. Output file contains variables lined up next to each other so the values can be compared clearly.

ul.li: Unlimited number of input files to compare. Allowed format are XML, properties and tabular.
File format: XML, properties file or tabular
Case sensitive: only pertinent for tabular format
Remove empty values: only pertinent for tablular format
Input file column to match: only pertinent for tablular format. Choose one column only for each input file.
Input file column to compare: only pertinent for tablular format. Choose one or more columns for each input file.
